org.agent.slang.dm.narrative

Class PatternMatchingComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ib.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • org.ib.component.base.LivingComponent
        • org.agent.slang.dm.narrative.PatternMatchingComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ib.component.base.ActiveListener, org.ib.component.base.Closeable, org.ib.component.base.Publisher, org.ib.component.base.ReactiveListener, org.ib.component.base.Sink, org.ib.component.base.Source

    public class PatternMatchingComponent
extends org.ib.component.base.LivingComponent
    This component is used to match a proper pattern for received input. As well as making decision about what to do with that matched pattern. OS Compatibility: Windows and Linux

    • Field Summary
